concept.title: Starting and Stopping WebLogic Servers
concept.shortdesc: For Windows platforms, the CÃºram SDEJ provides Ant targets to aid in the starting and stopping of the WebLogic server.

conbody.p: These targets must be executed from the <SERVER_DIR> directory and, for the configure target, they require the AppServer.properties file to be set up correctly. For more information, see . They also require a number of extra parameters to be specified. These are detailed below.
